channel.title: Women In Tech on Danny Freese - Coding for a Living
channel.description: Recent content in Women In Tech on Danny Freese - Coding for a Living

item.title: Women in Tech - Eff the Unconcious Bias
item.description: When I started to study computer science and make the transition into the field it was extremely glamorized from where I was standing. Oh cool I’m going to be a coder, and solve problems. Which don’t get me wrong, it’s completely valid and true. On top of that, there is also this talk of fighing the “uncious bias”, and if it is exists. Then all of the sudden I would look up from my desk or office and realize hmm yeah there are in fact no women in sight.
